mapper.select: select news_id,news_title,news_describe,news_time,news_type,news_collection,news_imgUrl,news_state from news_tab ORDER BY news_time DESC
select count(*) as count from news_tab
select * from news_tab where news_id = #{0}

select n.comment_id,n.news_id,u.user_id,u.user_nickname,n.comment_content,n.comment_time,n.comment_state,news_tab.news_title from newsComment_tab as n ,user_tab as u,news_tab where n.user_id = u.user_id and n.news_id = news_tab.news_id
select count(*) as count from newsComment_tab

select n.comment_id,n.news_id,u.user_id,u.user_nickname,n.comment_content,n.comment_time,n.comment_state,news_tab.news_title from newsComment_tab as n ,user_tab as u,news_tab where n.user_id = u.user_id and n.news_id = news_tab.news_id limit #{0}, 15;

select A.*,user2.user_nickname as replay_user FROM user_tab as user2 INNER JOIN (select r.replay_id,r.comment_id,u.user_id,u.user_nickname as comment_user,n.comment_content,r.replayUser_id,r.replay_content,r.replay_time,r.replay_state from newsComment_tab as n ,user_tab as u,newsReplay_comment as r where r.comment_id = n.comment_id and u.user_id =n.user_id) A on A.replayUser_id = user2.user_id
